config.timestamp.column.name: param_tracking_column
config.query: SELECT EVENT_TIMESTAMP_UTC, TO_CHAR(SESSIONID) AS SESSIONID, DBUSERNAME AS USERID, ( CASE WHEN EXECUTION_ID IS NOT NULL THEN NULL ELSE ( SELECT GLOBAL_NAME FROM CONTAINERS (GLOBAL_NAME) WHERE CON_ID IN ( SELECT CON_ID FROM V$MYSTAT ) ) END ) CON_NAME, OS_USERNAME AS OS_USER, SUBSTR( REGEXP_SUBSTR(AUTHENTICATION_TYPE, 'HOST=([^)]*)'), 6 ) AS CLIENT_HOST_IP, USERHOST AS CLIENT_HOST_NAME, ( SELECT SYS_CONTEXT('USERENV','SERVER_HOST_IP') FROM DUAL ) SERVER_HOST_IP, CLIENT_PROGRAM_NAME, TO_CHAR(DBID) AS DBID, ( SELECT NAME FROM V$DATABASE WHERE DBID = DBID) DBNAME, TO_CHAR(RETURN_CODE) AS RETURN_CODE, SQL_TEXT FROM Unified_AUDIT_TRAIL
